lead_paragraph: Former champion Fernando Verdasco of Spain became the last player to advance to the second round of the U.S. men's clay court championships Tuesday night with a 6-4, 6-3 victory over Argentina's Carlos Berlocq.

headline.print_headline: Verdasco Advances at US Men's Clay Court Championships
headline.main: Verdasco Advances at US Men's Clay Court Championships
